# Part III: Gathering Evidence from the World {.unnumbered}

Once you know what you're asking, it's time to go looking for answers. This section explores the wide world of evidence: public data, private data, customer conversations, AI, models, financials, and more. We’ll treat each as a way of knowing — not just a source of facts.

We’ll cover:

- Where to find useful, credible data
- When to trust experts, models, and machines
- What customers can tell you — and what they can’t
- How to use accounting and structure as strategic insight
